data.text: @DrDeepakKrishn1 TRUE... DOCTOR! 👍🏻👍🏻.. INCLUDING ME (THOUGH I AM SEVENTY +😃)..
@DrDeepakKrishn1 True Doctor. Covid has taught some bad habits also

@DrDeepakKrishn1 Well, that's true.

My comment applies to those who work digital jobs that only require internet and a laptop.

Those can totally work remotely.

My point is that not all remote workers are closed at home. They can and do work from different places as they prefer.
@SergioRocks Not the whole world works in IT industry.

@DrDeepakKrishn1 Remote work means freedom!

1. Freedom to work from home
2. Freedom to work from an office
3. Freedom to work from a coworking space
4. Freedom to work from a beach in Bali
5. Freedom to work from a mountain house

Ultimately, freedom to work from wherever you feel like working.
@RebelloAnil Not everything can be done from home. That's the point I'm trying to make.
